senses.synonym: 01811355-a (aroused to impatience or anger; \""made an irritated gesture\""; \""feeling nettled from the constant teasing\""; \""peeved about being left out\""; \""felt really pissed at her snootiness\""; \""riled no end by his lies\""; \""roiled by the delay\"");02464897-a (troubled persistently especially with petty annoyances; \""harassed working mothers\""; \""a harried expression\""; \""her poor pestered father had to endure her constant interruptions\""; \""the vexed parents of an unruly teenager\""
